title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 April 2014 - XWiki

08:55 <tmortagne> msmeria: Hi  
08:55 <tmortagne> when you have some time would be great if you could take care of http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki60M2#HTestedBrowsers26Databases section  
08:55 <tmortagne> I plan to release today  
08:56 <msmeria> tmortagne: ok. thanks!  
09:14 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <tmortagne> [ANN] starting 6.0M2 release, hold your commits please  
09:31 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:32 <spu7nic> has joined #xwiki  
09:32 <andreeapopescu> has joined #xwiki

10:00 <cjd> vmassol: that self-hosting git server... 24 LoC (plus license) https://github.com/ansuz/quineserv/blob/master/quineserv.js  
10:05 <Sidali> has joined #xwiki  
10:13 <vmassol> XE failing on ci  
10:13 <vmassol> doesn't look too good: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise/10851/console  
10:14 <vmassol> Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException  
10:14 <vmassol> at org.xwiki.extension.repository.internal.core.DefaultCoreExtensionRepository.exists(DefaultCoreExtensionRepository.java:173)  
10:29 <tmortagne> vmassol: this is a flickering, I restarted XE build  
10:30 <tmortagne> I still don't have any idea what produces that but it's pretty rare  
10:30 <vmassol> ok something to look at in the future since it measn it may happen on XE in production when it starts too possibly  
10:32 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:44 <sbaloul> has joined #xwiki  
10:44 <tmortagne> [ANN] git/maven release done, you can resume committing  
10:45 <spu7nic\_> has joined #xwiki  
10:45 <spu7nic\_> greetings :)  
10:46 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:46 <gdelhumeau> hi  
10:47 <gdelhumeau> mflorea: Can I help you with XWIKI-9716?  
10:47 <mflorea> no, thanks  
10:47 <mflorea> I'm working on other issues for 5.4.3 for EM/DW in parallel anyway, it's not just that.  
10:48 <mflorea> 5.4.4  
10:50 <spu7nic\_> Is it possible to change the decimal mark for float and double values? I tried to switch the language, but that doesn't seem to change the number formatting :/  
11:20 <evalica> has quit  
11:21 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:26 <Denis2> has joined #xwiki  
11:27 <spu7nic\_> has quit  
11:27 <tmortagne> vmassol: looks like active install module does not take into account proxy setup (see XWIKI-10209)  
11:28 <vmassol> tmortagne: hmm that's important to fix, I'll need to check it out  
11:28 <vmassol> (will do asap)  
11:29 <tmortagne> on my side looks like AETHER upgrade broke proxy support in EM...  
11:29 <vmassol> nice  
11:29 <vmassol> ...  
11:29 <tmortagne> will need to debug that  
11:30 <tmortagne> I guess it's more some change in the way to setup it than real bug since that's the version used by Maven 3.2.1  
11:30 <Denis1> has quit  
11:30 <tmortagne> I need to find a way to have automated tests with a proxy  
11:50 <cjd> https://github.com/skwakman/nodejs-maven-plugin  <-- interesting  
11:50 <cjd> would allow us to avail ourselves of some of the nice js tools like jshint and uglify  
11:50 <cjd> jshint especially  
12:01 <tmortagne> vmassol: looks like we have an issue with either jira macro or jira itself on xwiki.org, see release notes on http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Syntax+Highlighting+Application  
12:02 <polx> has quit  
12:02 <vmassol> the macro is ok I believe  
12:03 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/sr/jira.issueviews:searchrequest-xml/temp/SearchRequest.xml?jqlQuery=project+%3D+XCONTRIB+AND+component+%3D+%22Wiki+Editor+Tools%22+AND+resolution+%3D+Fixed+AND+fixVersion+%3D+%22Wiki+Editor+Tools+2.2%22+ORDER+BY+priority+DESC  
12:03 <vmassol> " The value 'Wiki Editor Tools' does not exist for the field 'component'."  
12:04 <vmassol> I've just checked and indeed there's no such component  
12:05 <vmassol> I'll fix this  
12:05 <vmassol> a new jira was created apparently  
12:05 <vmassol> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/WIKIEDITOR  
12:10 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
12:17 <vmassol> any idea why this query gives not reuslt: http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=project%20%3D%20%22Wiki%20Editor%20Tools%22%20AND%20resolution%20%3D%20Fixed%20AND%20fixVersion%20%3D%20%222.0%22 ?  
12:17 <vmassol> for ex http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/WIKIEDITOR-5 should match  
12:18 <vmassol> seems like a jira indexing issue IMO  
12:18 <vmassol> ok fixed  
12:18 <vmassol> there was a whitespace in the version name  
12:19 <vmassol> tmortagne: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Syntax+Highlighting+Application is fixed now  
12:19 <vmassol> thanks  
12:25 <tmortagne> vmassol: cool

16:00 <tmortagne> for Eclipse users (as aware as me) I just (finally) discovered a (very old) useful feature: http://www.eclipseonetips.com/2010/02/01/generate-static-imports-in-eclipse-on-autocomplete/  
16:00 <Chuguniy|2> has quit  
16:00 <Chuguniy> has joined #xwiki  
16:00 <cjd> that looks like an UnmaintainableCodeFactory  
16:01 <cjd> well.. I suppose it's maintainable with your IDE and it's symbol resolver... but isn't this getting into obfuscation?  
16:02 <tmortagne> not sure what you are talking about, it just help you find the needed static import for methods exactly as it does already for types  
16:02 <tmortagne> so that you don't have to put the import yourself  
16:02 <cjd> hmm yeah in tests you do kind of have to  
16:03 <tmortagne> yes the use case is unit tests  
16:03 <cjd> what I imagine is opening a file with a bunch of static imports    doStuff, doSomethingElse,  otherFunction  
16:03 <tmortagne> I never use static import elsewhere  
16:03 <cjd> and then having those functions peppered all throughout the file  
16:03 <tmortagne> but most test framework are kind or designed with static import in mind  
16:03 <cjd> import static some.class.Class.clone;  // haha  
16:04 <cjd> yeah, test frameworks are indeed the exception  
16:04 <cjd> imagine static importing half of ioutils, you'd never know where those functions were coming from  
16:04 <cjd> well... without a symbol resolver :)  
16:05 <tmortagne> the other nice thing is that Eclipse will finally use the right automatic import for Test (by default it use the previous deprecated one)  
16:11 <tmortagne> mflorea: you might like it if you don't already know about it  
16:12 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
16:19 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
16:38 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
16:49 <vmassol> @sbaloul: it would be interesting that you reply to the 2 proposal emails I sent this morning since you're working on apps  
16:50 <sbaloul> Ok, I'm going to reply  
16:50 <vmassol> thanks
